name: ocl-icd

variants.name: headers
variants.description: Install also OpenCL headers to use this as OpenCL provider

description:
This package aims at creating an Open Source alternative to vendor
specific OpenCL ICD loaders.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: ruby
dependencies.description:
A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity
and productivity.

dependencies.name: asciidoc-py3
dependencies.description:
Python 3 port of Asciidoc Python. AsciiDoc is a text document format for
writing notes, documentation, articles, books, ebooks, slideshows, web
pages, man pages and blogs. AsciiDoc files can be translated to many
formats including HTML, PDF, EPUB, man page.

dependencies.name: xmlto
dependencies.description:
Utility xmlto is a simple shell script for converting XML files to
various formats. It serves as easy to use command line frontend to make
fine output without remembering many long options and searching for the
syntax of the backends.

dependencies.name: opencl-headers
dependencies.description: Bundled OpenCL (Open Computing Language) header files

dependent_to.name: pocl
dependent_to.description:
Portable Computing Language (pocl) is an open source implementation of
the OpenCL standard which can be easily adapted for new targets and
devices, both for homogeneous CPU and heterogeneous GPUs/accelerators.
